Description: how many interviews per spot on average
number of simulations to run for every signal value checked
alpha parameter/shape for gamma distribution (mean = alpha*beta)
beta parameter/scale for gamma distribution (var = alpha*beta^2)
minimum number of signals to study
maximum number of signals to study
prefix for result file that will go to simulation_results/ folder
Options are True or False: if True then program will randomly select programs from all applicants and ignore 50/25/25 quartile assumption
